title: Poems From The Grave
description: Ghosts, spirits and demons! Oh, my! Discover real haunted places that I have investigated, stumble into the dark world of my nightmares and share my paranormal experiences as you read through my poetry. Walk with me as I celebrate the true spirit of Halloween and discover all those things that go bump in the night. Author is not responsible for paranormal activity that you may suffer after reading this book.
author: Amanda Springer
